17
18#include "BitSource.h"
19#include "ByteArray.h"
20#include "ZXContainerAlgorithms.h"
21
22#include <stdexcept>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25
26int
27BitSource::available() const
28{
29 return 8 * (Size(_bytes) - _byteOffset) - _bitOffset;
30}
31
32int
33BitSource::readBits(int numBits)
34{
35 if (numBits < 1 || numBits > 32 || numBits > available()) {
36 throw std::out_of_range("BitSource::readBits: out of range");
37 }
38
39 int result = 0;
40
41 // First, read remainder from current byte
42 if (_bitOffset > 0) {
43 int bitsLeft = 8 - _bitOffset;
44 int toRead = numBits < bitsLeft ? numBits : bitsLeft;
45 int bitsToNotRead = bitsLeft - toRead;
46 int mask = (0xFF >> (8 - toRead)) << bitsToNotRead;
47 result = (_bytes[_byteOffset] & mask) >> bitsToNotRead;
48 numBits -= toRead;
49 _bitOffset += toRead;
50 if (_bitOffset == 8) {
51 _bitOffset = 0;
52 _byteOffset++;
53 }
54 }
55
56 // Next read whole bytes
57 if (numBits > 0) {
58 while (numBits >= 8) {
59 result = (result << 8) | _bytes[_byteOffset];
60 _byteOffset++;
61 numBits -= 8;
62 }
63
64 // Finally read a partial byte
65 if (numBits > 0) {
66 int bitsToNotRead = 8 - numBits;
67 int mask = (0xFF >> bitsToNotRead) << bitsToNotRead;
68 result = (result << numBits) | ((_bytes[_byteOffset] & mask) >> bitsToNotRead);
69 _bitOffset += numBits;
70 }
71 }
72
73 return result;
74}
75
76} // ZXing
77
